title: For Everyone Going To Main Ivern Before He's Even Released.
body:
[](https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/frontpage/apps/prod/rg-ivern-reveal/en_US/2968a07d6b6c7f3d5882cfd18cf1c6c177cd0db4/assets/img/ivern-collage-640x360.jpg)
I suggest ** brushing** up on your skills before you play him in ranked. 

http://mrwgifs.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/Ba-Dum-Tsss-With-Harley-Quinn-On-The-Drums-In-Batman-The-Animated-Series.gif

replies.body:
make a team of lorewise super friendly champions.

toplane {{champion:44}} one of the most benevolent people.
support {{champion:201}} his heart is the strongest muscle
jungle ivern cuz he is super chill.
midlane{{champion:432}} cuz hes so happy (or on meth) that all he does is sing.
adc {{champion:22}} she wants peace for everyone.

> [{quoted}](name=agbudar,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=E4ujodva,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-04T02:45:41.515+0000)
>
> make a team of lorewise super friendly champions.
> 

> adc {{champion:22}} she wants peace for everyone.

Let's be honest here, {{champion:96}} is the cutest, friendliest adc in the game.
_Ahem _{{champion:6}}
{{champion:82}} Remember when they called him a marksman
They called him a bot lane carry.
His primary role was changed to "marksman" for a while.

http://www.theblaze.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/shutterstock_113077762-620x413.jpg
"Shoots metal out of his fingertips"
http://scontent.cdninstagram.com/t51.2885-15/s480x480/e35/13561943_263238910709095_1787161841_n.jpg?ig_cache_key=MTI4MTg1MDAxMjA4Mjg2MDU4NA%3D%3D.2
https://pics.onsizzle.com/you-cant-just-throw-someone-out-a-helicopter-because-theyre-3086446.png

> [{quoted}](name=Mokkun,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=E4ujodva,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-10-04T03:00:26.131+0000)
>
> Let's be honest here, {{champion:96}} is the cutest, friendliest adc in the game.

Lies. {{champion:18}} nobody can beat a Yordle with a dragon
{{champion:21}} {{champion:53}} https://media4.giphy.com/media/ff0dv4KMGxjna/200.gif
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qb9hsys9LFI
People who actually want to win in rank? HA! Thats a good one bud. People first time champs in ranked every game.
I thought that was a myth! (currently unranked)
They don't. People actually try to win. But unless you're doing great you might find some players who will be toxic towards you.

I honestly don't see Ivern appealing to alot of people.

Considering the most popular champions, the majority of the League playerbase like overly serious high damage dealing edgy champions.
 
And Ivern is the complete opposite of that. Fortunately. 

League doesn't need more "tryhard" champs anytime soon.

_Almighty._
I WILL TAKE IVERN IF NO ONE WANTS HIM
